attributes.action: Chernobyl Children Appeal (NI) Ltd would like to know when Britian will sign an agreement with Belarus to lift the ban on Chernobyl Children coming to the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bringing children from Belarus to NI is one of our major projects of the year. At present we are starting to plan opur project for 2009 and we need some indication as to if and when this agreement will be signed.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
